sentence.Network_en: Miro is the most inventive and entertaining of surrealist painters.
sentence.Network_cn: 米罗是最具创造力和娱乐性的超现实主义画家。

sentence.Network_en: Dali's shoe hat was undoubtedly the most surrealist idea he ever worked on with Schiaparelli.

sentence.Network_en: Surrealist painter of our time never actually obtained a formal art degree.

list.abs: the lexicon of surrealist art .超现实主义艺术的词汇

wild MUSSELS is a tragi-comedy with surrealist elements portrays the life of three young friends on an island in the more unknown southwest of the Netherlands .《野蚌》是一部具有超现实主义元素的悲喜剧，讲述了在荷兰西南一个不知名的小岛上的三个年轻朋友的生活。
超现实主义电影超现实主义电影(surrealist film) 把文学上的超现实主义的创作方法运用于电影创作的电影流派。承袭了这一创作主张的倡导者安德烈-布菜东的原则.

entry.def: Surrealist means related to or in the style of surrealism.

example.ex: Dali's shoe hat was undoubtedly the most surrealist idea he ever worked on with Schiaparelli.
example.tran: 达利的鞋状帽子无疑是他与夏帕瑞丽合作出的最具超现实主义色彩的创意。

entry.tran: 超现实主义作家;超现实主义艺术家
entry.def: A surrealist is an artist or writer whose work is based on the ideas of surrealism.

means.word_mean: 1. an artist who is a member of the movement called surrealism
